install: apt-get update && apt-get install -y docker-ce docker-ce-cli containerd.io docker-compose git curl build-essential

terminals.name: Build All Groups
terminals.command: for d in docker/*/ ; do [ -f "$d/docker-compose.yml" ] && (cd "$d" && docker-compose up -d --build); done

terminals.name: Pytest All Agents
terminals.command: for d in docker/*/ ; do [ -f "$d/docker-compose.yml" ] && (cd "$d" && for svc in $(docker-compose ps --services); do docker-compose exec $svc pytest || true; done); done

terminals.name: Lint All Agents
terminals.command: for d in docker/*/ ; do [ -f "$d/docker-compose.yml" ] && (cd "$d" && for svc in $(docker-compose ps --services); do docker-compose exec $svc flake8 . || true; done); done

terminals.name: Logs All Agents
terminals.command: for d in docker/*/ ; do [ -f "$d/docker-compose.yml" ] && (cd "$d" && for svc in $(docker-compose ps --services); do docker-compose logs $svc --tail=100; done); done

terminals.name: Migration All DB
terminals.command: for d in docker/*/ ; do [ -f "$d/docker-compose.yml" ] && (cd "$d" && for svc in $(docker-compose ps --services); do docker-compose exec $svc alembic upgrade head || true; done); done

terminals.name: Shell All Agents
terminals.command: for d in docker/*/ ; do [ -f "$d/docker-compose.yml" ] && (cd "$d" && for svc in $(docker-compose ps --services); do docker-compose exec $svc bash || true; done); done
